publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6001 Rhona Brankin: Fertility Postcode Lottery—That the Parliament welcomes the news that 12 out of 14 NHS boards are compliant with the national criteria for Level III Assisted Conception Treatment of 39 years inclusive; regrets that NHS Fife and Lothian have yet to comply, and calls on them to do so.

S3M-6001 Rhona Brankin: Fertility Postcode Lottery—That the Parliament welcomes the news that 12 out of 14 NHS boards are compliant with the national criteria for Level III Assisted Conception Treatment of 39 years inclusive; regrets that NHS Fife and Lothian have yet to comply, and calls on them to do so. Supported by: Helen Eadie*, Bill Kidd*, Jackie Baillie*, Elaine Smith*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-6001 Fertility Postcode Lottery (lodged on 18 March 2010) Ms Wendy Alexander*, Cathie Craigie*, Dr Richard Simpson*, James Kelly*, Elaine Murray*, Trish Godman*
S3M-6001 Fertility Postcode Lottery (lodged on 18 March 2010) Mr Frank McAveety*, Sarah Boyack*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-6001 Fertility Postcode Lottery (lodged on 18 March 2010) John Park*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-6001 Fertility Postcode Lottery (lodged on 18 March 2010) Angela Constance*
S3M-6001 Fertility Postcode Lottery (lodged on 18 March 2010) David Stewart*
